text: Gu Por, gu Krais Zisas farasarigi ŋaara guma. Ana vuzvugar, Fhe Bakɨme anan ŋaarar muun zav nan farasarigi. Na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma Timoti, ŋka kha gava khergiap, nde Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi, nde Korosi ŋgu bakɨmen kav, nza phorgap guigira Krais khothɨgap ana zɨn vui. Ŋka kha gavar nde ndi mbai. Nza Ndia Fhe Bakɨme fura nden korar muuŋv, ndava mɨɨtɨgar nden nɨɨŋrim, nde kɨri.
